paper_abstract: We focus on infinite words with languages closed under reversal. If frequencies of all factors are well defined, we show that the number of different frequencies of factors of length n + 1 does not exceed 2 Delta C(n) + 1, where Delta C(n) is the first difference of factor complexity C(n) of the infinite word. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on symmetries in the Rauzy graph and factor frequencies
